title: Refrigerator, Spanish Speaking Staff, Hardwood Floors
posting_body: ['Leave your worries behind when you come home to the Bellaire Oaks Apartments.', 'Our pet-friendly apartment homes in Southwest Houston near Meyerland Plaza offer a sense of escape from the daily hustle.', 'This feeling of tranquility and relaxation starts when you glimpse the verdant landscaping in our garden-style community and is enhanced by resort-style amenities and a variety of upscale features and floor plans designed to complement your lifestyle.', 'With seven pools and many amenity upgrades to come, our community is sure to make you feel at home.', 'Make your getaway to the Bellaire Oaks Apartments.', '-Ceiling Fans with Light Fixtures', '-Refrigerator', '-Elegant Crown Molding', '-On-Site Maintenance', '-Lovely Courtyard or  View', '-Night Patrol', '-Mini Blind Window Coverings', '-Hardwood Floors', '-Fully Equipped Kitchen with Stainless Double Sink', '-Onsite Laundry Facilities', '-Gas Range', '-Courtyard with Trellis', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
